data.name: Urizen Shadows of the Cold
data.detailed_description:
KEYBOARD AND GAMEPAD COMPATIBLE

A free copy was given earlier to those reviewers at ORLYGIFT, this FREE version featured no keyboard compatibility, this is NO LONGER TRUE. Urizen Shadows of the Cold is readily Keyboard and Gamepad enabled.


Digital Deluxe Edition

COMING SOON AS FREE HUGE BONUS UPDATE THIRD QUARTER 2017, buy now for $1.99 and avoid paying full price when the Deluxe Frosty Edition Update arrives.


Steam Achievements will be Introduced with the Deluxe Frosty Release

Sorry for the confusion, but Steam achievements have already been implemented but will only show up on the Deluxe version which will be released third quarter 2017. Thank you.


The Deluxe Frosty Edition will Include

Deluxe Frosty Update will Definitely Include
- +30 Steam Achievements
- revamped bosses
- 10 New Readily Playable and Hidden Warriors-
- an interactive training stage
- 2 player co-op mode
- 3 different difficultry modes
- expanded save menu
- fullscreen/window option
- the ability to manually enable 2 or 1 gamepads and/or 1 keyboard
- an enemy and hero museum showcasing all the warriors and baddies with deatiled descriptions and storyline
- the Urizen "Bazzar" store enabling the purchase of new warriors, powerups, and elixirs
- the "Witches Hut" enabling the selling and trading of items for cash or items like potions.
- a "block" button will be implemented
- the removal of floating coins
- coin bags and treasure chests among will replace those floating coins
- stage design will be updated
- the ability to speak to natives and towns people will be made providing with unique hints, and secrets
- 12 totally new stages
- new bosses
- new complete ending
- more hidden secrets and or easter eggs
- expanded cutscenes
- new "Frosty" themed menu layouts
- enemies killed will leave behind items that can be collected, traded or sold, at the "Witches Hut".
- Revamped SFX selection
- Soundtrack DLC will be available for $1.99
- thorough bug and glitch removal has been made
- revamped more sophisticated enemies and updated warriors

NOTE* I have mentioned a vs battle mode and a create a warrior, this may or may not appear 'till the end of the year, in another update.


About the Game

KEYBOARD AND JOYSTICK COMPATIBLE. Huge free BONUS update to DELUXE Frosty Edition is set for third quarter 2017, price will revert to $3.99. Purchase now for $1.99.

Stretch across lands of unforeseeable cold, and trouble in Urizen Shadows of the Cold, soon to update to Urizen Shadows of the Cold Deluxe Frosty Edition.

- Currently a massive 50 warrior "head bopping", sword slashing platformer with characters raging from beasts, ogres, ninjas, knights, aliens, sorcerers, mermaids and demons.

- includes 34+ massive stages, complte with bosses
- retro styled pixel graphics
- cool cheat menu
- head bop combo system
- implemented save feature
- enabled music test menu
- music from music composer Efe Tozan "Falanca"
- simple yet crazy and intense retro, pixel graphic styled game play paying tribute to that old plumber and that ninja with the dragon tooth sword, and a unique set of
weapons/projectiles for each warrior enabling close counter melee attacks
- also featuring some cool cut scenes and a unique but weird story line
- also handles many secrets, hidden warriors and hidden gems

- +30 Steam Achievements
- revamped bosses

- the Urizen "Bazaar" store enabling the purchase of new warriors, power-ups, and elixirs

data.short_description: KEYBOARD AND JOYSTICK COMPATIBILE.  Grab a copy now for $1.99 before it updates to the Deluxe Version priced at $3.99.  Stretch across lands of unforeseeable cold, and trouble in Urizen Shadows of the Cold. Now a massive 50 warrior "head bopping",  sword slashing platformer with characters raging from giants, ninjas, knights, aliens, sorcerers, mermaids and demons.  It includes 34+ massively created stages with more to come. It also includes a cool cheat menu, an enabled combo system, an implemented save feature, enabled music test menu, crazy and intense retro styled game play paying tribute to that old plumber and that ninja with the dragon tooth sword, and unique weapons/projectiles for each warrior enabling close counter melee attacks.  Also featuring some cool cutscenes and a unique but weird storyline. It also handles many secrets, hidden warriors and hidden gems.  Deluxe Frosty Edition Update will be coming 3rd quarter 2017.  Update will include Steam Achievements.
